quote: But I hate to hear you talking so like a fine gentleman, and as if women were all fine ladies, instead of rational creatures. We none of us expect to be in smooth water all our days.
quote_letters: BUT I HATE TO HEAR YOU TALKING SO LIKE A FINE GENTLEMAN AND AS IF WOMEN WERE ALL FINE LADIES INSTEAD OF RATIONAL CREATURES WE NONE OF US EXPECT TO BE IN SMOOTH WATER ALL OUR DAYS
